name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Software Development Engineer in Test with 8 years of experience, specializing in **test automation** and **automated testing frameworks** leveraging tools like **Playwright**, **Selenium**, and **RestAssured**. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Java**, and **C#**, I implement robust testing solutions that enhance software reliability. My background includes extensive CI/CD expertise using **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **Azure DevOps**, streamlining workflows to improve delivery cycles.
Skilled in Agile development methodologies and experienced with project management tools like **JIRA**, I foster collaboration across teams. I have hands-on experience in database management and queries with **SQL**, and using tools like **Postman** for API testing.
In my previous roles, I led initiatives to deploy containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated them with **Kubernetes**. Additionally, I utilized performance testing tools such as **JMeter**, **K6**, and **Gatling** to ensure applications meet high-quality standards. My strengths include building high-performance solutions in complex environments, with a strong foundation in compliance standards.
